title: Towards sustainable charcoal production: Designing an economical brick kiln with enhanced emission control technology

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Zelalem Getahun, Mikiyas Abewaa, Ashagrie Mengistu, Eba Adino, Kumera Kontu, Kenatu Angassa, Amare Tiruneh, Jemal Abdu
